articles.author: Yoonjung Seo,Brad Lendon
articles.title: Terrifying moments as plane door opens midair on Asiana Airlines flight - CNN
articles.description: The door of an Asiana Airlines jet opened as it was coming in to land in Daegu, South Korea, on Friday afternoon, leaving wind whipping through the plane’s cabin as terrified passengers gripped their armrests, video of the incident shows.

articles.title: Asiana Airlines: Passenger arrested for opening plane door during South Korea flight - BBC
articles.description: The Asiana Airlines plane landed safely in South Korea after a passenger forced open an emergency door.
articles.content:
Media caption, Watch: Inside cabin as plane door opened mid-flight
A man has been arrested for opening a door of an Asiana Airlines flight as it was landing in South Korea.

articles.title: Passenger's Bizarre Excuse On Opening Emergency Exit Of Plane Mid-Air - NDTV
articles.description: A passenger on an Asiana Airlines flight told police he opened a door on the plane minutes before it landed in Daegu, South Korea, on Friday because he was "uncomfortable", Yonhap News Agency reported.
articles.content:
The man opened the door when the plane was about 700 feet above the ground.
